data.title: Company Profile
data.meta_description: StrongDM - Cloud-based database security and management solution. Raised a total funding of $111M over 9 rounds from 21 investors. Founded by Elizabeth Joy Zalman and Justin McCarthy in the year 2014. StrongDM has 49 competitors.

StrongDM - About the company

What does StrongDM do?

Cloud-based database security and management solution. It provides database security monitoring and auditing solution to the organization. The features include database permissions and access control of the onboarding employee across the organization, integrated SSO, monitoring, and auditing employee activity to identify suspicious behavior.

Which sectors and market segments does StrongDM operate in?

StrongDM serves in the B2B, SaaS space .

StrongDM's funding and investors

Filter this list

How much funding has StrongDM raised till date?

StrongDM has raised a total funding of $111M over 9 round s. Its first funding round was on Apr 08, 2015.

What are the most recent funding rounds of StrongDM?

Its latest funding round was a Series C round on May 02, 2024 for $34M. 8 investor s participated in its latest round, lead by Anchor.

Who are StrongDM's investors?

StrongDM has 18 institutional investor s including Sequoia Capital, Tiger Global Management and True Ventures. Jerry Neumann and 2 other s are Angel Investors in StrongDM .

View details of StrongDM funding rounds and investors

StrongDM's founders and board of directors

Founder? Claim Profile

Who are the founders of StrongDM?

The founders of StrongDM are Elizabeth Joy Zalman and Justin McCarthy. Elizabeth Joy Zalman has founded 1 more compan y - Media Armor.

Who is the current CEO of StrongDM?

Elizabeth Joy Zalman is the CEO of StrongDM .

StrongDM's Competitors and alternates

Competitive landscape of StrongDM

StrongDM ranks 1 st among 49 competitors which include Axiomatics, QueryPie and Sentrigo. 8 of its competitors are funded while 5 have exited. Overall, StrongDM and its competitors have raised over $350M in funding across 40 funding rounds involving 98 investors. There are 5 acquired companies in the entire competition set.
